channel.title: What's it called when you cant drink alcohol?
channel.description: What's the name of the disorder where you can't drink alcohol or it makes you really bad? I don't know the details of what happens exactly, but I do know it begins with P.

item.title: What's it called when you cant drink alcohol?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I’m racking my brains, but I can’t think what you’re on about.

The only thing I can think of that begins with a P and is remotely alcohol related is Pancreatitis (alcoholics get it a lot :/)

Read full topic
item.source: What's it called when you cant drink alcohol?

item.title: What's it called when you cant drink alcohol?
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:8, topic:314451”]There’s definitely more than one disorder that means drinking alcohol isn’t a great idea

Any more specific?[/quote]

All I know is that it begins with P, my memory really sucks. It’s actually a real medical disorder too, not something stupid. There can’t be that many… :0

Read full topic
